originalText.text: Judy is absolutely amazing! I visited NY last week & had a session with her. I asked her 7 -10 questions & showed her pictures & she gave me clarity, guidance & confirmed the direction of my thinking. So spot on!! I love how Judy doesn‚Äôt beat around the bush & gives it to you straight. I have talked to a lot of different psychic mediums/clairvoyant etc but I felt great energy from Judy from the second I met her. Judy is the real deal, definitely book a session with her, you won‚Äôt regret it. Thank you Judy!! You are the bestest!!

originalText.text:
I had my first session with Judy yesterday, I‚Äôm not the best phone person but she made me SO comfortable, the time really flew by! She took so much care in speaking with me and explaining any area I was confused about, it was like having a conversation with an old friend. She lovingly gives insight you may not want to hear, but NEED to.
Judy had also given me direction to further improve my path outside of our session together. Not many people do that and she does! My mom had her reading today and we‚Äôre eager to share our experiences. Big thank you to this wonderful woman!  üíï‚ú®

originalText.text: Judy is extraordinary! I‚Äôm still buzzing from the experience. With just a few pictures and questions she was able to provide wildly insightful perspective on various storylines in my life. Looking forward to working with her in the future.

originalText.text: Took a trip to New York and wanted to get some insight for my team and I from a conduit of a light. Judy is that. She‚Äôs humble, she‚Äôs to the point and she‚Äôs gifted in so many ways. Her energy is safe. I trusted her right off the bat. I don‚Äôt usually seek guidance from google searches but I was aligned to find her. She‚Äôs an amazing person. I will continue to use her guidance in this journey. She gave us all clarity and lifted so much weight we were holding. Thank you Judy!
